{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.06197v1", "title": "Orthogonal polynomials with complex densities and quantum minimal
  surfaces", "summary": "We show that the discrete Painlev\'e-type equations arising from quantum
minimal surfaces are equations for recurrence coefficients of orthogonal
polynomials for indefinite hermitian products. As a consequence we obtain an
explicit formula for the initial conditions leading to positive solutions.", "main_category": "math-ph", "categories": "math-ph,math.MP", "published": "2025-04-08T16:41:12Z"}
